snippet.title: Rise of Shadows Cinematic Trailer | Hearthstone
snippet.description:
Get in touch with your E.V.I.L. side in Hearthstone’s newest expansion, Rise of Shadows!

Rise of Shadows is bringing 135 new cards to add to your collection, including Lackeys, Schemes, the new Twinspell keyword, and much more! Also stay tuned for a brand new single-player experience coming shortly after Rise of Shadows launches. 

Pre-purchase Rise of Shadows and make sure you’re ready to answer Arch-villain Rafaam’s call when the expansion launches on April 9 (PT). Two pre-purchase options are available, and you can get BOTH for double the value!

Learn more at http://www.RiseofShadows.com

LEARN MORE about Hearthstone: https://playhearthstone.com

SUBSCRIBE to follow Hearthstone: http://blizz.ly/Subscribe

Hearthstone is Blizzard Entertainment’s highly acclaimed digital strategy card game that’s easy to learn and massively fun. Start playing for free and wield your cards to sling spells, summon creatures, and command the heroes of Warcraft in duels of epic strategy.
